quotes.quote: War and drink are the two things man is never too poor to buy.
Drink because you are happy, but never because you are miserable.
One martini is alright, two is too many, three is not enough.
An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools.
Here's to alcohol, the rose colored glasses of life.
In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.
The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober.
The problem with the world is that everyone is a few drinks behind.
I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, That's as good as they're going to feel all day.
I try to convince myself that it's the alcohol talking. But alcohol can't talk. It just sits there. It can't even get itself out of the bottle.
This is one of the disadvantages of wine: it makes a man mistake words for thought.
A bottle of wine contains more philosophy that all the books in the world.
There is no bad whiskey. There are only some whiskeys that aren't as good as others.
A man is a fool if he drinks before he reaches the age of 50, and a fool if he doesn't afterward.
One can drink too much, but one never drinks enough.
Stay busy, get plenty of exercise, and don't drink too much. Then again, don't drink too little.
Age is just a number. It's totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine.
Give me a woman who loves beer and I will conquer the world.
There comes a time in every woman's life when the only thing that helps is a glass of champagne.
Champagne for my real friends and real pain for my sham friends.
When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
The first glass is for myself, the second for my friends, the third for good humor, and the forth for my enemies.
Better belly burst than good liquor be lost.
I drink to make other people more interesting.
There are more old drunkards than old physicians.
Everybody's got to believe in something. I believe I'll have another beer.
Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
A man's true character comes out when he's drunk.
Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
One reason I don't drink is that I want to know when I am having a good time.
Writer's block is a fancy term made up by whiners so they can have an excuse to drink alcohol.
A drunk man's words are a sober man's thoughts.
I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
Drink today, and drown all sorrow; you shall perhaps not do tomorrow.
You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
He that drinks fast, pays slow.
24 hours in a day, 24 beers in a case. Coincidence?
I know I should give up drinking; but I am not a quitter
If you ever reach total enlightenment while drinking beer, I bet it makes beer shoot out your nose.
Either give me more wine or leave me alone.
I am a drinker with writing problems.
No soldier can fight unless he is properly fed on beef and beer.
Good people drink good beer.
We drink and we die and continue to drink.
I get no kick from champagne, / Mere alcohol doesn't thrill me at all, / So tell me why should it be true / That I get a kick out of you.
In 1969 I  gave up women and alcohol. It was the worst 20 minutes of my life.
Alcohol...enables parliament to do things at eleven at night that no sane person would do at eleven in the morning.
I have a rare intolerance to herbs which means I can only drink fermented liquids, such as gin.
It was my uncle George who discovered that alcohol was a food well in advance of medical thought.
And he that will go to bed sober, Falls with the leaf still in October.
Best while you have u have it use your breath, There is no drinking after death.
We drink one another's healths and spoil our own.
Claret is the liquor for boys; port, for men; but he who aspires to be a hero must drink brandy.
I always keep a supply of stimulant handy in case I see a snake— which I also keep handy.

Unfortunately, one of the by-products of drinking alcohol is not increased self-awareness; hence. the difficulty in letting a drinker know that he has had enough, that she has a drinking problem, or that he should not get behind the wheel of that car, especially if the car is still in the showroom.
My daddy, he'd walk forty miles for liquor but not forty inches for kindness.
The chief reason for drinking is the desire to behave in a certain way, and to be able to blame it on alcohol.
I drink too much. The last time I give a urine sample, it has an olive in it.
I don't drink anymore. I don't drink any less either.

When it comes to drunks, we do our best because we would hope for and expect the same from our friends. Sometimes— okay, make that most of the time— things get a little messy, but that doesn't mean they can't get a little funny,too.
It takes only one drink to get me drunk. The trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or the fourteenth.
When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink.
Work is the curse of the drinking classes
I like to have a martini, two at the very most. After three I'm under the table, after four I'm under my host.
Too much of anything is bad, but too much Champagne is just right.
Time is never wasted when you're wasted all the time.
Love makes the world go round? Not at all. Whiskey makes it go round twice as fast.
The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.
Alcohol removes inhibitions – like that scared little mouse who got drunk and shook his whiskers and shouted: “Now bring on that damn cat!
My Grandmother is over eighty and still doesn't need glasses. Drinks right out of the bottle.
Not everyone who drinks is a poet. Some of us drink because we're not poets.
When we drink, we get drunk. When we get drunk, we fall asleep. When we fall asleep, we commit no sin. When we commit no sin, we go to heaven. So, let’s all get drunk and go to heaven!
